642500.name: Zombie Quarantine - Art
642500.description:
This DLC pack contains original Zombie Quarantine art over the course of production.

-Music from Lo-Fi Guru.
-Original and new icons.
-Rendered zombie.
-Map pictures.

Extra:
The OST of Zombie Quarantine features three awesome, zombie-themed tracks.

Track 1 - Main Menu Theme is sung by a professional male choir and sounds very chilling
Track 2 - Ambience music in an electronic style to help keep your nerve as you navigate the maze that is Zombie Quarantine
Track 3 - Electronic beat to focus your heart on every inch of the puzzle

Help support us!
